document_data.name: City Guard of I'tiraf
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of [[I'tiraf]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City of Confessions".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 2,000 regular city guards, 300 [[cleric]]s, and six 300-man units of [[mamluk]]s from the [[Exalted Mamluk Society|Exalted]] and [[Devoted Mamluk Society|Devoted Mamluk Societies]]. An additional 8,000 soldiers and 3,000 cavalry from the [[Sword of the True Gods]] were also stationed in I'tiraf. I'tiraf's navy consisted of 16 ships.
document_data.Activities: Additional ''[[dhow|bahglahs]]'', or large dhows, were under construction as well.
